title: Four Ways to Cool Down Your Defensiveness
excerpt: Our brains make us naturally defensive, but there are steps we can take to cultivate more humility.

title: Mistakes Managers Should Avoid
excerpt: Some managers keep diaries of their on-the-job mistakes, partly to avoid repeating errors, and partly to make employees comfortable with failure. At least one added cartoons.

title: Fixing the Smartest Person in the Room Issue

title: How Do You Know if You’re Actually Humble?
excerpt: There are ways to figure out how aware you are of your own limitations—and to cultivate intellectual humility.
